main event: Witnesses observed two flying white discs in Peekskill, New York, on the evening of July 22, 1949.
interesting points: The discs were described as pure white and larger than a full moon,The witnesses reported the discs spinning at incredible speeds,The sighting occurred just after sunset with a blue sky and few clouds,The local radio station experienced technical difficulties around the same time as the sighting,The sighting was corroborated by three witnesses including a young man who is a concert pianist.
witness description: A wife, her thirteen-year-old daughter, and a young man
